ineligible_reasons: eGFR below inclusion threshold (32 mL/min/1.73 m²)
medications: Metformin ER 1000 mg BID; Atorvastatin 20 mg daily
narrative_note: 66-year-old Female with a history of type 2 diabetes diagnosed 8 years ago. Seen for routine outpatient follow-up. Reports mild fatigue. Current therapy: Metformin ER 1000 mg BID; Atorvastatin 20 mg daily. Home glucose readings: fasting 120–160 mg/dL. Comorbidities: hypertension. Denies hypoglycemia requiring assistance. Last HbA1c on 2025-10-30 was 8.7%. Plan: optimize regimen and follow-up in 8–12 weeks. Not eligible for cohort due to: eGFR below inclusion threshold (32 mL/min/1.73 m²).
